name: ProtoOne
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game is prototype student project, it will be a little wonky and a bit awkward to play at times. Assets are not complete and features may be incomplete.

General

You have been dropped into a town as a solo marine. You must kill the hordes of zombies to survive as long as you can with your limited resources. There are two enemies you must face, a standard and a spitter! You may trigger their appearance by walking in an area.
